Synchronous TCP/IP Library for Delphi

Can you help me?

If the destiny of Synapse is important to you, please help me! If you can help me with anything, please write an e-mail to me. Thank you.

Reporting about Synapse:

  • If you see something incorrect in the Synapse library, tell me about it.
  • If you use Synapse library in your program, tell me about it. I plan to create A reference catalogue of programs using Synapse. It creates publicity for you and me!

Review:

  • Write any reviews about Synapse.
  • Write a comparison of Synapse with another similar product.
  • Do any performance testing.

Contribute:

  • If you make any changes to the code, tell me about it.
  • If you write any useful units for the Synapse library, send them to me.
  • You create any sample programs.

Web:

  • You can correct my terrible English to nice form. :-)
